name: SocioTest
description:
SocioMe is a text-based mouse-only game that criticizes how social media and "clout" changes society's acceptance. It is made for BUG 2019 Fall Semester.

You are a consciousness in a computer, without a body. To get an avatar and access to the real world, you have to pass the test.

Although there is only one way to fail it, your scores change every time you take the test even though you picked the same choices.

P.S. At the start of the game, it says that you can go to hyesmo.com to read the dev statement but I didn't have time to edit my webpage. Please don't care that message.
